title: Последователи
overview: Vera has a terrible disease – infertility. Together with her beloved husband Andrey, she goes to a distant secret hermitage, where a certain healer, Father Athanasius, lives. Despite Andrey's skepticism, a miracle happens: Vera is pregnant. But over time, the heroes, without knowing it, find themselves under the influence of a terrible destructive cult, and Andrei must do everything to save his Vera.
